name: Hokaku
description:
My first 3D game made using Unity. The aim of the game is to capture all the enemies within the time limit by defeating them. Your remaining time will be your score and at the end the top 3 scores will remain so compete to keep your time up there!

Controls

Use the WASD keys to move around

Press space to attack

To pause the game either hold left alt to bring up the mouse and click on the pause icon in the top left or press escape

Move the mouse left and right to rotate the camera

To quit the game if on the main menu simply just click on quit other wise pause the game and select quit to return to the main menu
